ingredients.ingredient: 1 (0.13 ounce) package unsweetened fruit-flavored drink mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Use unsweetened drink mix for proper tartness since condensed milk provides sweetness
Fold whipped topping gently to maintain airy texture in the filling
Chill finished pie for at least 2 hours before serving for proper setting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through balancing tartness and sweetness in this no-bake pie and explain how simple ingredients create a nostalgic, fun dessert.
